item.title: [pi] VOTE COMMAND URGENT
item.dc:creator: @grats grats
item.description:
@grats wrote:

Ok guys i have two issues first it keeps bringing up pages when i use my vote command no idea why. Second ppl can do it as many times as they want any suggestions on them? If so please post here, also here is my vote command

             	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("vote")) {
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++)
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
					c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.runelocus.com/toplist/index.php?action=vote&id=8407", 12000);
				                c.getItems().addItem(995, 50000);
					c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting! Please do the same Tomarrow!");
				}
		}

Read full topic
